context: Can this game be played on the PS2?
response: Hi there,This game cannot be played on the Play Station 2.

context: what memory card type does this system use
response: It uses a proprietary sony memory card called an "M2". It is also used by some sony ericson phones.

context: Does it have the back little feet behind it,to elevate the keyboard?
response: Yes it does, however the elevation isn't that great.

context: I bought it, I think it downloaded but can't find it to play it  How do I play it?
Are all the games multi hands???
response: This was a gift for my husband so I will tell you that he says, "No, they are NOT all multi hands".  Hope this helps you.

context: what is the different from PC/PSB and the Xbox 360/PC if just using it on a PC only
response: Jimmy, could not have said it more simple. The choice is yours.

context: Anyone know if you can swap the art on the stick?
response: Its a little difficult.  The art already on it is one big sticker.  You will either have to have something printed with an adhesive backing or buy a plexi top.

context: Does this game require Origin to be played?
response: I log into the origin servers, but it did not appear to be required.

context: How easy or difficult is it to put these in the Dualshock 4 and how long did it take you to do?
response: Just YouTube a tutorial. It took me about 20 mins not having a clue what I was doing. They work great.

context: does it work with the wii?
response: Works with my wii. Any controller that works with the Gamecube should work with the Wii (same attachments/plugs)

context: I have played this on a dell computer that had windows xp, 3gb of ram does this game cause viruses?
response: No. A game will not cause viruses.
they would have to get the 2.0 game disc to upgrade before using 2.0 figures -iwd

context: can you fish in the game
response: According to my Granddaughter who I bought this game for, the answer is yes, you can fish

context: is this like an extra battery in the grip itself. also what charger it takes. the 1st gen vita or 2nd gen vita charger. thanks if you reply
response: It does have a battery in the grip. It takes the 2nd gen charger.

context: does this game include war of chifes and asian dynasties?
response: No. War Chiefs and Asian Dynasties were separate purchases.

context: I'm afraid that I won't like this game, does the gameplay suck?  I hear it's like one of those "click and move" Nancy Drew type things (no offense).
response: I am not very far into it yet, but it seems fun so far.  Not sure about click and move...you have options and the options include moving from place to place.
